message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer of $1000000?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. Based on my budget, I am willing to offer $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 to reach a compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's the best I can do.
